% following is the digitized data for the AR-731 available in its spec
% sheet
clc;clear;close all
% Starting with brake horsepower data:
RPM_bhp = [2870.712401055409, 3010.52631600000,3500,4005.26315800000,4510.52631600000,5000,5505.26315800000,5978.94736800000,6484.21052600000,6989.47368400000,7510.52631600000,7984.21052600000];
BHP = [9.35361216730038, 10.1140684400000,12.9277566500000,15.7414448700000,18.8593155900000,21.8250950600000,25.0950570300000,27.9847908700000,31.1026616000000,33.9163498100000,36.2737642600000,38.4030418300000];
% Then we move onto the SFC data:
RPM_sfc = [4010.55409000000,4501.31926100000,4992.08443300000,5498.68073900000,6005.27704500000,6496.04221600000,7018.46965700000,7525.06596300000,8000];
SFC = [0.628787879000000,0.630303030000000,0.628787879000000,0.627272727000000,0.624242424000000,0.618181818000000,0.609090909000000,0.584848485000000,0.559090909000000];
% Finally we enter the torque data:
RPM_torque = [2870.712401055409, 3010.52631600000,3500,4005.26315800000,4510.52631600000,5000,5521.05263200000,5994.73684200000,6500,7005.26315800000,7494.73684200000,8000];
Torque = [16.34980988593156, 16.8821292800000,18.5551330800000,20.1520912500000,21.6730038000000,23.1939163500000,24.304182500000,24.8669201500000,25.30912547528517,25.6273764300000,25.491216730038024,25.1711026600000];%(lb/ft)

%Now recreating the plot from the spec sheet

yyaxis left
plot(RPM_bhp,BHP,'r-o','MarkerFaceColor','r','LineWidth',2); hold on
plot(RPM_torque,Torque,'g-o','MarkerFaceColor','g','LineWidth',2);grid on
ylabel('Brake Horse Power & Torque (lb/ft)')
ylim([0 40])

yyaxis right
plot(RPM_sfc,SFC,'b-o','MarkerFaceColor','b','LineWidth',2);grid on
ylabel('Specific Fuel Consumption (lb/bhp/hr)')
ylim([0.4 1.2])
yticks([0.5 0.6 0.7])

legend('BHP','Torque','SFC','Location','NorthWest')
xlabel('Engine Speed')
